metadata.title: CVE-2019-14247 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The scan() function in mad.c in mpg321 0.3.2 allows remote attackers totrigger an out-of-bounds write via a zero bitrate in an MP3 file.

criterions.comment: mpg321: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
